column4: hi if I want to backup partitions (so also the partition structure and not only tarballing the files) what is a good app?
I'd rather have a gui backup program
I just boot it in my vmware
luckyBackup is a great gui app.
Its not mounted when I back it up don't worry :)
btw, it uses the fast efficient rsync protocol.
cronie: does it backup the partition structures ?
yeah, its on my fedora box, but ubuntu has it too
cronie: ok thanks will try it out
cronie: can it backup the MBR too ?
